title: Join CNN’s 1% savings challenge | CNN Business
text:
Improving your personal finances is always a good idea, albeit a difficult task. And in an uncertain economy, shoring up some extra savings is one smart way to deal with the unexpected and give yourself options.

That’s why CNN is excited to announce its 1% savings challenge that will kick off a bit later this year.

See Full Web Article
